product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Red Creek +0 Sleeping Bag - Regular - Special Buy
long_description: This 3-season backpacking bag uses an overlapping shingle construction with a warm, durable and compressible insulation that eliminates cold spots and retains warmth, even when damp.
short_description: This 3-season backpacking bag uses an overlapping shingle construction with a warm, durable and compressible insulation that eliminates cold spots and retains warmth, even when damp.
